Text: Never had a problem with TvTeam, but on this movie, in WMP the audio skips about every 5-7 seconds. I tried DivX Player, and it shows the first 3 seconds of the movie then stops playback and shows a random ad for DivX on either newegg or Facebook.  Anyone else having problems?
no problems whatsoever. another awsome up from TvTeam. much thanks.
